summary.caption: “Hey, who’s that? … Oh—Mitch, the janitor. Well, our first test run has just gotten a little more interesting.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for March 20, 2024

summary.caption: “Blast! … You raise a dog from a pup, and suddenly one day he turns out to be a chicken killer!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for March 20, 2024

summary.caption: In a barbarian faux pas that quickly cost him his life, Garth is caught drinking his gruel with pinky fingers extended.

summary.caption: “Say ... now I’m starting to feel kinda warm!”
